statement.title: # Content
statement.content:
There are infinite coins with values $1, 2, 5, 10$.

What's the minimum numbers of coins should be picked that $X$ and $Y$ can be made change for?

statement.title: # Standard Output
statement.content: The minimum numbers of coins should be picked.

statement.title: # Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
8 94

statement.title: # Note
statement.content: In sample, four coins $1, 2, 2, 5$ and $1, 1, 2, 5$ both can make change for $8$ and $9$.
